overview: stalwart: 17 tools; stalwart_list_accounts -> List accounts (users, groups, domains) with filtering, stalwart_get_account -> Get account details by name, stalwart_create_account -> Create email account with password, stalwart_update_account -> Update account settings, stalwart_delete_account -> Delete account permanently, stalwart_queue_status -> Get mail queue status, stalwart_list_queue -> List queued messages, stalwart_queue_start -> Start queue processing, stalwart_queue_stop -> Stop queue processing, stalwart_queue_retry -> Retry queued message, stalwart_queue_delete -> Delete queued message, stalwart_get_dns_records -> Get required DNS records for domain, stalwart_generate_dkim -> Generate DKIM key for domain, stalwart_get_metrics -> Get server metrics, stalwart_get_reports -> Get DMARC/TLS reports, stalwart_get_settings -> Get server settings, stalwart_reload_config -> Reload configuration
